data.eml:eml: New species of “ giant ” plume moths of the genus Platyptilia (Lepidoptera, Pterophoridae) from Uganda

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peter USTJUZHANIN, Vasiliy KOVTUNOVICH (2016): New species of “ giant ” plume moths of the genus Platyptilia (Lepidoptera, Pterophoridae) from Uganda. European Journal of Taxonomy 172: 1-6, DOI: 10.5852/ejt.2016.172
